authors.affiliation: Cancer Research UK Cambridge Institute, University of Cambridge

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fvamq","text":"Ensure shelves of incubator are truly level with a spirit level or app","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8c83o","text":"Corning CellStacks (2-layer: Corning 3269, 5-layer:Corning 3313)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9agft","text":"Complete cell culture media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0riq","text":"Phosphate-buffered saline","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55dps","text":"Trypsin solution (usually 0.25%, with EDTA and phenol red; Gibco 25200)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3prg7","text":"Centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ppji","text":"50ml centrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6o3if","text":"Per flask, Prepare and pre-warm:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0cqe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cq0r6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"989f3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ft11q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Reagent","2-layer","5-layer"],"colWidths":["241",100,100],"data":[["PBS","250ml","500ml"],["Trypsin","40ml","100ml"],["Complete media for trypsin inactivation","40ml x2","100ml x2"],["Complete media for plating","220ml","550ml"]],"guid":"B6D3D9C0753F11EDA7BFED00EEF70EDB","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["PBS","250ml","500ml"],["Trypsin","40ml","100ml"],["Complete media for trypsin inactivation","40ml x2","100ml x2"],["Complete media for plating","220ml","550ml"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mmdk","text":"Pour out media in flask, wash out remaining media twice by:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":50,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mtjb","text":"Adding PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uq6h","text":"Distributing evenly between layers to cover the entire culture surface area","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0g0d","text":"Pouring out PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab7m3","text":"Add Trypsin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j27d","text":"Incubate flask for around    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bgqbn","text":"Tap flask to dislodge cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","duration":180,"error":false,"guid":"9D87C51E715311EDACFB0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"in incubator","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci64u","text":"Add 1 aliquot of media for trypsin inactivation and distribute evenly between layers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d06ts","text":"Collect cell suspension into duran bottles (250ml for 2-layer, 500ml for 5-layer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e7bh","text":"Wash out remaining cells with the other aliquot of inactivation media similarly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nh9r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4q7u","text":"Reduce clumping by pipetting up and down multiple times with a 10ml serological pipette against the bottom of the bottle  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mujv","text":"If necessary, centrifuge cells for replating at   and remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2arp7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhgjr","text":"If plating into CellStacks: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n6u","text":"Resuspend cells in media for plating","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"botcs","text":"Transfer suspension into flask by pouring or pipetting","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6ov3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"85D7C4DE715511EDACFB0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cilm4","text":"Count cells using a Vi-Cell and calculate volume of cells for seeding","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6o3if","text":"Per flask, Prepare and pre-warm:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0cqe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cq0r6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ft11q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Reagent","2-layer","5-layer"],"colWidths":["241",100,100],"data":[["Complete media for plating","220ml","550ml"]],"guid":"B6D3D9C0753F11EDA7BFED00EEF70EDB","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Complete media for plating","220ml","550ml"]],"rowHeights":[23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"592ku","text":"Take flask out of incubator, and place in upright position. Wipe down cap areas with 70% ethanol if desired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bvae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3neu6","text":"Holding the flask with the long side facing downwards, uncap the bottom cap, and pour out media in flask onto a walls of a large 10L tub to prevent splashing, shake flask to remove the final few drops.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"228at","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3dhd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":412,"id":422920,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"fsk49\",\"text\":\"IMPORTANT: Handle flasks for cell culture in a suitable biosafety cabinet. Image taken for demonstration of flask handling only.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7akbiprp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7aibiprp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7ajbiprp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7ahbiprp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aph8n","text":"Place CellStack on its flat position.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o0tt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"717r6","text":"For 2-layer CellStacks, pipette in new warm media 50-60ml at a time until 220ml has been added","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qo40","text":"For 5-layer CellStacks, pour in 550ml of new warm media (often an entire bottle)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65sj0","text":"To evenly distribute media between layers: Flip flask towards you such that it rests on its longer side.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"app1u","text":"  Then tilt into the upright position:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4o6h3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":412,"id":422924,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"918da\",\"text\":\"For 2-layer CellStacks, place a finger on the bottom ledge to ensure flask is level.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}},{\"key\":\"2gebn\",\"text\":\"\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}},{\"key\":\"7k8kh\",\"text\":\"IMPORTANT: Handle flasks for cell culture in a suitable biosafety cabinet. Image taken for demonstration of flask handling only.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7aqbiprp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7anbiprp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7apbiprp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7ambiprp.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":733,"id":422928,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7aubiprp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7asbiprp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7atbiprp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7arbiprp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an2qk","text":"Reseed cells at desired density.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcmqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p63a","text":"If plating into CellStacks: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"211hl","text":"Calculate the required volume of cell suspension for plating","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm79n","text":"Remove the same volume of media from the pre-warmed aliquot of media for plating and replace with the cell suspension","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpg22","text":"Transfer suspension into flask by pouring or pipetting","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9iot9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cbfk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f41qn","text":"Return flask to incubator, lying flasks flat while minimising sudden or large movements to avoid media spilling between layers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rac","text":"Transfer desired number of cells (usually 5e7) into 50ml centrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6o9u","text":"Centrifuge cells at   and remove supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fe2im","text":"Resuspend with   , centrifuge and remove supernatant again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"81nnn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"85D7C4DE715511EDACFB0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"PBS","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a9p84","text":"Flick tube to loosen pellet and freeze on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
